data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Livio Marinelli signals a Sampdoria throw-in in Bologna's half.
In the minute 1, Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
In the minute 3, Important block from the Sampdoria defence as Aaron Hickey fires in a strike for Bologna.
Antonio Candreva (Sampdoria) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
In the minute 7, Goal! A Morten Thorsby header gives Sampdoria a 1-0 lead in Genoa.
Great play from Antonio Candreva to set up the goal.
Throw-in Bologna.
In the minute 9, In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Aaron Hickey (Bologna) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 14, Livio Marinelli blows against Bologna's Riccardo Orsolini for offside.
Bologna have a dangerous throw-in.
Sampdoria are coming forward and Fabio Quagliarella gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 15, Bologna have a goal kick.
Bologna pushes forward through Rodrigo Palacio, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Sampdoria's Antonio Candreva is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Bologna apply pressure and a brilliant scoring opportunity is created for Riccardo Orsolini. But the ball crashes against the crossbar!
In the minute 25, Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Bologna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bologna drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 28, Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
Ball safe as Sampdoria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Genoa Bologna's Rodrigo Palacio is caught offside.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Bologna.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Can Sampdoria capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 35, Free kick for Sampdoria in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sampdoria in Genoa.
Livio Marinelli awards Bologna a goal kick.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bologna at Luigi Ferraris.
Free kick Bologna.
In the minute 39, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Bologna close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bologna at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 42, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Sampdoria awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Palacio (Bologna) has received a yellow card from Livio Marinelli.
In the minute 44, Bologna have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Vasco Regini has the misfortune to make it 1-1 through an own goal.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Sampdoria.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Genoa.
The second-half is underway in Genoa.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Sampdoria in their own half.
Rodrigo Palacio for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 52, Goal! Riccardo Orsolini heads Bologna into a 1-2 lead.
Rodrigo Palacio with an assist there.
Throw-in for Sampdoria in the half of Bologna.
In the minute 53, Livio Marinelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella is whistled for offside at Luigi Ferraris.
In Genoa Sampdoria drive forward through Fabio Quagliarella. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 54, Livio Marinelli awards Bologna a goal kick.
Sampdoria's Antonio Candreva gets in a shot on goal at Luigi Ferraris. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sampdoria push forward at Luigi Ferraris and Albin Ekdal gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Bologna defence.
In the minute 55, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
Livio Marinelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
Sampdoria's Fabio Quagliarella is whistled for offside at Luigi Ferraris.
Throw-in for Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 60, Fabio Quagliarella (Sampdoria) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Bologna at Luigi Ferraris.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Sampdoria to take a throw-in in Bologna territory.
Throw-in for Sampdoria close to the penalty box.
Free kick Sampdoria.
In the minute 64, Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
Throw-in for Sampdoria at Luigi Ferraris.
Sampdoria needs to be cautious. Bologna have an attacking throw-in.
Livio Marinelli signals a throw-in for Sampdoria, close to Bologna's area.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Adrien Silva with Gaston Ramirez. This is the first substitution made today by Claudio Ranieri.
Sampdoria have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Sampdoria.
In Genoa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Sampdoria.
Livio Marinelli signals a free kick to Bologna in their own half.
In the minute 69, Sampdoria's Morten Thorsby has been booked in Genoa.
Nicolas Dominguez is replacing Mattias Svanberg for Bologna at Luigi Ferraris.
In the minute 70, Musa Barrow for Bologna gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sampdoria goal kick.
Claudio Ranieri is making the team's second substitution at Luigi Ferraris with Jakub Jankto replacing Vasco Regini.
In the minute 71, Gaston Ramirez for Sampdoria has been booked by Livio Marinelli and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Bologna in their own half.
In Genoa, Roberto Soriano of Bologna is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 72, Musa Barrow (Bologna) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Can Bologna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sampdoria's half?
In the minute 73, Throw-in high up the field for Bologna in Genoa.
Bologna have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Bologna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for Bologna in the half of Sampdoria.
Livio Marinelli waits before resuming play because Jerdy Schouten for Bologna is still down.
Bologna drives forward and Rodrigo Palacio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
In the minute 79, Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) has taken off Jerdy Schouten who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Gary Medel is the replacement.
Free kick for Bologna in the half of Sampdoria.
In the minute 82, Bologna's Musa Barrow gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sampdoria defender.
Corner awarded to Bologna.
Nicolas Dominguez for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 84, Sampdoria's Gaston Ramirez goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Genoa.
Livio Marinelli signals a Bologna throw-in in Sampdoria's half.
In the minute 86, Sinisa Mihajlovic (Bologna) is making a third substitution, with Nicola Sansone replacing Riccardo Orsolini.
Emanuel Vignato is replacing Musa Barrow for Bologna at Luigi Ferraris.
At Luigi Ferraris the fourth official shows that 6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aaron Hickey for Bologna is back on the field again.
Bologna have been awarded a corner by Livio Marinelli.
Nicola Sansone for Bologna is whistled offside.
Bologna are on the attack at Luigi Ferraris, where Rodrigo Palacio is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In Genoa Bologna attack through Emanuel Vignato. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Genoa.
Livio Marinelli awards the away team a throw-in.
Bologna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Sampdoria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bologna's half?
Livio Marinelli blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Genoa to check on Aaron Hickey, who is grimacing with pain.
